title: General
content:
General

State Regulations

Supervisory Policy 1 - Schedule of Addresses and Fees (§ 1.1 to 1.2)

Supervisory Policy 2 - Advertisement of Interest Rates on Savings and Time Accounts (§ 2.1 to 2.2)

Supervisory Policy 3 - Notice of Minimum Balance Requirements on Day-of-Deposit to Day-of-Withdrawal Savings Accounts (§ 3.1 to 3.3)

Supervisory Policy 4 - Public Accommodation Offices, Adjoining Facilities, and Adjacent Facilities (§ 4.1 to 4.3)

Supervisory Policy 5 - [Reserved]
Supervisory Policy 6 - Branching Policy for Banking Organizations (§ 6.1 to 6.3)

Supervisory Policy 7 - Legalization of Foreign Documents (§ 7.1 to 7.3)

Supervisory Policy 8 - Registration of Domestic Representative Offices (§ 8.1 to 8.5)

Supervisory Procedure 100 - Addressing of Requests for Official Action (§ 100.1 to 100.2)

Supervisory Procedure 101 - Notice of Automated Data Processing Systems: Superintendent's Right to Examine Independent Services (§ 101.1 to 101.2)

Supervisory Procedure 102

Supervisory Procedure 104 - Application for a Public Accommodation Office (§ 104.1 to 104.2)

Supervisory Procedure 105 - Application for a Change of Location or a Change of Designation of Principal Office (§ 105.1 to 105.5)

Supervisory Procedure 106 - Public Access to Banking Department Records (Repealed)

Supervisory Procedure 107 - Repealed

Supervisory Procedure 108 - Evidence of Compliance with Executive Law, Section 296-a (§ 108.1 to 108.3)

Supervisory Procedure 109 - Procedures for Filing of Applications Under Banking Law, Section 32 (Insurance of Deposits and Share Accounts) (§ 109.0 to 109.3)

Supervisory Procedure 110 - Requests for Declaratory Rulings (§ 110.1 to 110.4)

Supervisory Procedure 111 - Administrative Adjudication Policy and Plan; Procedural Requirements (Repealed) (§ 111.1 to 111.8)

Supervisory Procedure 112 - Report of Planned Branch Closings (§ 112.1 to 112.5)

Supervisory Procedure 114 - Access to Personal Information (§ 114.1 to 114.12)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
